channel.title: Server worlds
channel.description:
Is it possible to have 2 different worlds that load different scripts?
Atm I have 2 worlds but I would like to change one of them to be a pking world(All teles and shops pk based) and then the other world a skilling world (All teles and shops skilling based). Is this possible? Or can I only do one script for both worlds?
Someone before suggested that I make world 2 height level 2 which would make it floating but I dont want that...

item.title: Server worlds
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

If it’s a Project Insanity based server, then yes, simply change the heights.

Read full topic

item.title: Server worlds
item.dc:creator: @Pr0ject_pvp Pr0ject pvp
item.description:
@Pr0ject_pvp wrote:

Having to height levels will not make it float. It depends on the way you do it.

Read full topic

implement a login server.
